com.test9.irc.parser

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.test9.irc.parser.Parser

  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to parse messages that come from the server. ::= [':' ] ::= | [ '!' ] [ '@' ] ::= { } | ::= ' ' { ' ' } ::= [ ':' | ] ::= ::= ::= CR LF
    Author:
    Jared Patton

      • parse

        public Message parse(java.lang.StringBuffer message)
        This should be the only method that is called in this class. This is used to parse raw output from the server and will return a new message from the parsed information. Necessary information should be read from the returned message.
        Parameters:
        message -
        Returns:
